metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The friend of the bridegroom... thankful to be the best man.

cognitieve_implicaties: The preacher is not the center of attention
The joy of the preacher is derivative
theologische_implicaties: Covenantal relationship between God and humanity
onbedoelde_consequenties: Potential exclusion of those with negative wedding/marriage experiences

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'Best Man' image to explain the psychological relief of not being the 'Master'.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon centers on the distinction between 'A Master' (teacher) and 'The Master' (ontological Savior), using the Best Man metaphor to anchor the preacher's role.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Liturgical synthesis through the Nicene Creed and Hymnody.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Master' metaphor by grounding it in personal narrative (Aunt Mary Virginia).
sterktes.voorbeeld: She left me Jesus... she used to call Jesus 'the Master'.

risicos.beschrijving: Potential to diminish Eastern traditions to elevate Christianity.
risicos.voorbeeld: If those words were spoken by any other guru... we would judge him to have gone off the deep end.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may develop a dismissive attitude toward interfaith dialogue.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A wedding preparation scene where the Best Man stands aside for the Groom.
sub_worlds: The 1993 New York Times/Vanity Fair media landscape

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Use of the Nicene Creed to define 'substance'.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strong alignment with Advent themes of preparation and the Nicene Creed.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by Relational and Journey metaphors. It successfully moves from an abstract 'Economic' marketplace of spiritual goods to a concrete 'Familial' legacy of faith. The 'Master' metaphor is the pivot point, transitioning from a title of respect (Source: Education) to a title of divinity (Source: Lordship).

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Risk of sounding like a 'Dead Metaphor' or slave-imagery.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect 'Master' more deeply to the 'Best Man' joy to show it is a relationship of love, not just power.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Master who washes the feet of the Best Man.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly link the 'Bridegroom' as the one 'of one substance' with the Father.

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Emphasize that the 'Savior' is found, not purchased.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To reinforce the 'built on a person' claim.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful use of CMT to clarify high-christology through the humble role of the Best Man.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'Best Man' rather than the beauty of the prose.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Analyzes the conceptual structures rather than the learning styles of the listeners.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses the 'Master' metaphor to bridge the gap between human admiration and divine worship.

appendices.notities: The sermon effectively uses 'Schema Disruption' to challenge the 'Jesus as Teacher' model prevalent in 1990s American culture.
